question: Is it permissible to pray namaz with half sleeve t-shirts or should the whole of your arms should be covered.
answer:
QUESTION
Is it permissible to pray namaz with half sleeve t-shirts or should the whole of your arms should be covered. Pls can you provide with any back up with your reply jazakallah
ANSWER


Share:
It is Makrooh to perform Salaat with sleeves that do not cover the elbow. (Fataawa Mahmoodiyah vol.2 pg.234, 252, 180)

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
